attr.title: The Caribbean Sail
attr.desc: Name your crew, purchase supplies, sail the world, harpoon fish, plunder your enemies, die horribly, unlock a new Captain and do it all over again!
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://victorian-clambake.itch.io/the-caribbean-sail), grab the Windows version (The Caribbean Sail - V1.7.1.6.zip), extract, and copy the game files into the thecaribbeansail/assets folder. The Steam version works, too.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://victorian-clambake.itch.io/the-caribbean-sail), grab the Windows version (*The Caribbean Sail - V1.7.1.6.zip*), extract, and copy the game files into the `thecaribbeansail/assets` folder. The Steam version works, too.
